title: Out with the old, in with the new! Res Lease in Austin. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: *FIRST TWO WEEKS FREE with immediate move-in* Fantastic 3-Bed Apartment in Exclusive Austin Community - ALL UTILITIES ARE INCLUDED!!
High-end apartment living in a quiet, healthy-living community in a mixed-use development (residential & commercial).
Community Gardens, Solar Energy, Rain & Gray Water Recycling are just a few of the great amenities here.
Don't miss this rare opportunity to live with us, this Two-Story 3-bed/2-bath will not be available long.
Also enjoy discounted membership to the on-site gym business, which is just one of the many business that occupy this mixed-use development.
(Houses, Duplexes, Apartments, Condos, All Areas, All Prices)
PRICES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE DAILY/PICS MAY NOT REFLECT EXACT UNIT
